content:
73c6b4f0abb641dea32a0c2f:
  'description': Describes the process of purchasing and managing licenses
    for multiple users.
  'name': Multiple Users
  'attribute':
    35835a5943bc40b1a1a4022f:
      'description': The number of users who will be using the software.
      'attribute_name': number_of_users
    e4f0bd9d35264827871b4be1:
      'description': The type of software license in question.
      'attribute_name': license_type
d0e0555664d74524be1edc0a:
  'description': This intent deals with managing user accounts and access
    privileges.
  'name': User Management
  'attribute':
    41a0c8d34fe8419795c8e2d1:
      'description': The specific permissions granted to the user.
      'attribute_name': user_permission
    d79c546990fa432cb2307846:
      'description': The current status of the user account.
      'attribute_name': user_status
    e08c52532167470e98dc7fe0:
      'description': The role of the user in the system.
      'attribute_name': user_role
      'example_values':
      - admin
      - moderator
      - member
      - guest
fbf20b7216f240c1b9ea5b56:
  'description': Describes the steps to revoke a software license, cancelling
    its usage and permissions.
  'name': Revoke License
  'attribute':
    161cc92af7cc48dfb8ac5445:
      'description': The unique identifier of the license to be revoked.
      'attribute_name': license_number
      'example_values':
      - string of numbers and letters
    5033beb5dcca4e6097a89cf3:
      'description': The reason for revoking the license.
      'attribute_name': reason
    'example_values': text
    6d175f1c877549c7a55c8905:
      'description': The type of license to be revoked.
      'attribute_name': license_type
     'example_values': "Microsoft 365, Adobe Creative Coud, AutoCad
    7becd0b0397e422a853ec570:
      'description': The name of the person or organization the license is
        issued to.
      'attribute_name': licensee_name
      'example_values': " John Dow, BrightMindsCo"

Hjyf70b25n8f240c189ea5b74:
  'description': Applicable in situations where the user input does not match any predefined intent
'name': No Intent
